text: Danny Lee Jesus "D. J." Fluker (born March 13, 1991) is an American football offensive tackle who is a free agent. He played college football at Alabama, where he was recognized as an All-American. In addition to football, Fluker was also a member of the Foley track & field team. Over there, he threw the shot put. It was recorded a top-throw of 53 ft 1 in at the 2009 Mobile Challenge. He took 4th position. On March 7, 2017, Fluker was released by the Chargers, who had relocated to Los Angeles. == References == == Other websites == * Alabama Crimson Tide bio * San Diego Chargers bio * Seattle Seahawks bio Category:Miami Dolphins players Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:American football offensive tackles Category:Living people Category:1991 births
title: D. J. Fluker
